title: Build a Portfolio Website
description: Design and develop a responsive personal portfolio site. Should include sections for projects, about, and contact.

title: Create a Landing Page
description: Develop a modern, high-converting landing page. Must be optimized for speed and mobile devices.

title: Fix Website Bugs
description: Identify and fix front-end issues on an existing site. Focus on layout inconsistencies and JavaScript errors.

title: Design a Company Logo
description: Create a clean and professional logo for a new startup. Deliver source files in AI, PNG, and SVG formats.

title: Write Blog Articles
description: Write 5 SEO-optimized articles on tech trends. Each article should be 800–1000 words and plagiarism-free.

title: Social Media Marketing
description: Manage and grow our Instagram and Facebook accounts. Schedule 3-4 engaging posts per week with graphics.

title: Develop a Mobile App
description: Build a cross-platform app for a booking system. Features include user login, calendar, and notifications.

title: Create a Brand Style Guide
description: Develop a visual identity guide including colors, fonts, and logo usage. PDF format preferred for delivery.

title: Set Up Google Analytics
description: Integrate Google Analytics with our website. Provide a quick tutorial on using reports and custom events.

title: Design Product Packaging
description: Create packaging design for a new health supplement. Must follow FDA labeling standards and look modern.

title: Edit Promotional Video
description: Edit raw footage into a polished 60-second promo video. Add transitions, background music, and branding.

title: Translate Website Content
description: Translate a 5-page website from English to Spanish. Maintain professional tone and technical accuracy.

title: Create an E-commerce Store
description: Build a fully functional e-commerce store with payment gateway integration and user dashboard.

title: Develop Chatbot Integration
description: Integrate AI chatbot on company website to handle customer queries and support.

title: SEO Optimization
description: Improve website SEO to increase organic traffic and search ranking.

title: Design Business Cards
description: Design modern and clean business cards with company branding.

title: Create Email Newsletter Template
description: Design responsive email newsletter templates compatible with major email clients.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation for software API.

title: Conduct Market Research
description: Analyze competitors and market trends to guide product strategy.

title: Develop WordPress Theme
description: Create a custom WordPress theme optimized for blogs and portfolios.

title: Optimize Database Performance
description: Analyze and improve database queries to reduce load times.

title: Create Infographics
description: Design engaging infographics for social media campaigns.

title: Develop REST API
description: Build secure and scalable REST API for mobile app integration.

title: Set Up Cloud Infrastructure
description: Configure AWS or Azure infrastructure for scalable web applications.

title: Create Social Media Ads
description: Design and write copy for Facebook and Instagram ads.

title: Translate Mobile App
description: Translate app content into French and German with cultural adaptations.

title: Write Press Release
description: Write press release announcing new product launch.

title: Conduct User Testing
description: Organize and analyze usability testing sessions for web app.

title: Create Podcast Intro Music
description: Compose 30-second intro music for a tech podcast.

title: Design Newsletter Graphics
description: Create custom graphics for monthly email newsletter.

title: Build Custom CRM
description: Develop a customer relationship management system tailored for small businesses.

title: Optimize Website Speed
description: Improve load times and performance for an existing website.

title: Design Event Flyer
description: Create an eye-catching flyer for an upcoming event.

title: Create YouTube Thumbnails
description: Design custom thumbnails for a YouTube channel.

title: Build Chat Application
description: Develop a real-time chat application with group chat and file sharing.

title: Write Whitepaper
description: Create a detailed whitepaper on blockchain technology.

title: Create Mobile Game Art
description: Design characters and backgrounds for a 2D mobile game.

title: Set Up Email Automation
description: Configure email automation workflows for customer onboarding.

title: Translate Marketing Materials
description: Translate brochures and flyers into Chinese and Japanese.

title: Develop IoT Dashboard
description: Build a dashboard for managing and visualizing IoT device data.
